description:
For big days when efficiency is key, this chalk bag steps it up. It has storage space for a phone, keys, headlight and energy bars and a lower strap that will stash a rolled-up jacket.

  • Made of recycled polyester with fuzzy thick fleece lining
  • Two zippered and one mesh compartment hold essentials safe
  • Adjustable bungee for a rain jacket or midlayer
  • Drawstring and cordlock hold chalk securely inside
name: Mammut Alpine Chalk Bag
